be.quodlibet.jcoSon

Class jcoSon

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.quodlibet.jcoSon.jcoSon

  • public class jcoSon
extends java.lang.Object
    jcoSon will allow you to call SAP BAPIs and function modules using json. Both the parameters you pass to the function modules and the results you get back will be in json format. Homepage : http://dhorions.github.io/jcoSon Examples : https://github.com/dhorions/jcoSon/blob/master/README.md
